nodes.bodyText:
Fix a timeout failure:
https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/all-of-us/workbench/6396/workflows/3df44fa7-e8b5-448c-9c67-3ab504e74f1f/jobs/113642/steps
FAIL tests/notebook/notebook-python3.spec.ts (290.995 s)
  Jupyter notebook tests in Python language
    ✕ Run code from file (290223 ms)

  ● Jupyter notebook tests in Python language › Run code from file

    waitForKernelIdle encountered TimeoutError: waiting for selector `#MathJax_Message` to be hidden failed: timeout 120000ms exceeded

      126 |     } catch (e) {
      127 |       console.error(`Notebook kernel is: ${await this.kernelStatus()}`);
    > 128 |       throw new Error(`waitForKernelIdle encountered ${e}`);
          |             ^
      129 |     }
      130 |   }
      131 | 

      at NotebookPage.waitForKernelIdle (app/page/notebook-page.ts:128:13)
      at NotebookPage.isLoaded (app/page/notebook-page.ts:54:5)
      at NotebookPage.waitForLoad (app/page/authenticated-page.ts:35:5)
      at WorkspaceAnalysisPage.createNotebook (app/page/workspace-analysis-page.ts:77:5)
      at Object.<anonymous> (tests/notebook/notebook-python3.spec.ts:29:22)
Created new dataset-edit-page.ts class because clicking Edit option opens the Edit Dataset page.

Ignore error (okayed by @dolbeew)
https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/all-of-us/workbench/6404/workflows/5b652dc7-aac3-4598-a702-32df5abb47ae/jobs/113690/parallel-runs/1?filterBy=FAILED
FAIL tests/cohorts/cohorts-rename.spec.ts (159.676 s)
  User can create, modify, rename and delete Cohort
    ✕ Add cohort including Demographics Age (159052 ms)

  ● User can create, modify, rename and delete Cohort › Add cohort including Demographics Age

    TimeoutError: waiting for function failed: timeout 30000ms exceeded

      231 |          // wait for visible then compare texts
      232 |       await page.waitForSelector(selector.css, {visible: true, timeout});
    > 233 |       const jsHandle = await page.waitForFunction((css, expText) => {
          |                                   ^
      234 |         const element = document.querySelector(css);
      235 |         return element && element.textContent.includes(expText);
      236 |       }, {timeout}, selector.css, textSubstr);

      at new WaitTask (node_modules/puppeteer/lib/cjs/puppeteer/common/DOMWorld.js:505:34)
      at DOMWorld.waitForFunction (node_modules/puppeteer/lib/cjs/puppeteer/common/DOMWorld.js:460:26)
      at Frame.waitForFunction (node_modules/puppeteer/lib/cjs/puppeteer/common/FrameManager.js:910:32)
      at Page.waitForFunction (node_modules/puppeteer/lib/cjs/puppeteer/common/Page.js:1291:33)
      at Object.waitForText (utils/waits-utils.ts:233:35)
      at CohortParticipantsGroup.deleteGroup (app/page/cohort-participants-group.ts:79:5)
      at Object.<anonymous> (tests/cohorts/cohorts-rename.spec.ts:82:32)
